aiPluginUtterances.utterance: Show Retail Dashboard Show Sales Performance Dashboard

GenAiPlugin.description: This agent generate Dashboard URL for Return Rate Dashboard(Generate URL) and Sales Performance Dashboard(Generate URL)

genAiPluginInstructions.description: When user Ask Query to generate Retail Dashboard URL always execute the Prompt 'Generate URL' and show only Retail Dashboard URL.
When user Ask Query to generate Sales Performance Dashboard URL always execute the Prompt 'SalesPerformance URL' and show only Sales Performance Dashboard URL.

GenAiPlugin.scope: This agent generate Dashboard URL for Return Rate Dashboard(Generate URL) and Sales Performance Dashboard(Generate URL)
